Package ca.uqac.lif.cep.widgets

Class ListenerSource

java.lang.Object
ca.uqac.lif.cep.Processor
ca.uqac.lif.cep.SynchronousProcessor
ca.uqac.lif.cep.tmf.Source
ca.uqac.lif.cep.widgets.ListenerSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
ca.uqac.lif.cep.Contextualizable, ca.uqac.lif.cep.Duplicable, ca.uqac.lif.cep.DuplicableProcessor, ActionListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, EventListener, ChangeListener
public class ListenerSource extends ca.uqac.lif.cep.tmf.Source implements ActionListener, ChangeListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener
A Source processor that can be added as an ActionListener to an AWT or Swing widget.
Author:
Sylvain Hallé
